channel.title: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade
channel.description:
Hello, I'm suffering a little crash from Steam version, When i gib the Zombie Grunt (or Z.E.C.U as you prefer) with the MP5 grenade launcher, the game crashes without error message.
It's frustrating because people don't save the game and it have to start the same place again. Well, that's it. Thanks and sorry my bad english, I had to use Google Translate.
Here is my specs: Intel Celeron B800 1.5 GHz 6,00 GB RAM 250 GB HDD Windows 7 Ultimate x64 Intel HD Graphics
EDIT: It looks like it was fixed by restarting the computer, My bad.

item.title: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade
item.dc:creator: Matias-TM
item.description:
Well, it’s understandable because it’s a laptop, not a PC. But anyway thanks to all for the help.

EDIT: This only happen on my custom map, but in other maps doesn’t crash.

Read full topic
item.source: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade

item.title: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
It appears your system doesn’t meet the minimum system requirements for running the game.
The minimum needed is a 2.4 Dual Core Processor and a DEDICATED VIDEO CARD that has at least 1GB of memory on board.

Read full topic
item.source: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade

item.title: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade
item.dc:creator: Matias-TM
item.description:
I have all the settings in low. And gibs in other NPCs works perfectly. Also i’ve gib the Zombie Grunt with many weapons and it doesn’t crash, Only with the MP5.

That’s weird, because i have many modern games on my integrated graphics and works perfectly.

Read full topic
item.source: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade

item.title: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
Try lowering your resolution and all of the advanced graphics settings to see if you can make it by that particular spot.

Integrated graphics are below the minimum recommended specs for the game.

Read full topic
item.source: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade

item.title: (FIXED) Game crashes when i gib the ZECU with MP5 grenade

item.description:
Hello, I’m suffering a little crash from Steam version, When i gib the Zombie Grunt (or Z.E.C.U as you prefer) with the MP5 grenade launcher, the game crashes without error message.

It’s frustrating because people don’t save the game and it have to start the same place again. Well, that’s it. Thanks and sorry my bad english, I had to use Google Translate.

Here is my specs:
Intel Celeron B800 1.5 GHz

250 GB HDD

Intel HD Graphics
